name: México Street Photography for Artists and Travellers. Downtown.
description: The most important in the world is to learn to enjoy everything, this tour is sensitive. Get in touch and walk into the city not like tourist, were gonna try to see the differences of the culture. Fascinated by old buildings, music, museums, food, people. I can give you some tips and skills on how to take pictures and if you are starting your trip we can talk of some amazing places of México. (all the pictures were taken by me)
